issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fixVersions.description: Last release before 0.10.0, will contain the features for 0.10.0, the time between 0.9 and 0.10.0 is going to be used to stabilize the release

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

author.name: ronymin
author.emailAddress: ronymin at dgist dot ac dot kr

comments.body: I believe we must focus on the availability of FPM algorithm during the resurrection.

updateAuthor.name: ronymin
updateAuthor.emailAddress: ronymin at dgist dot ac dot kr

comments.body: Sorry, could u explain that - 'availability of FPM algorithm' ? Not sure I get what u r trying to convey.

author.name: ronymin
author.emailAddress: ronymin at dgist dot ac dot kr

comments.body:
I mean that the very first, but crucial problem of current implementation of FPM algorithm is the explosion of intermediate data when generating frequent patterns.
Above explosion makes FPM not available in many cases even we use very small input.
That problem comes from the shortage of intermediate buffer of MapReduce, but as we consider the FPM in the algorithm-level, so we should find the another alternatives either to avoid or handle that problem I mentioned.

updateAuthor.name: ronymin
updateAuthor.emailAddress: ronymin at dgist dot ac dot kr

comments.body: We don't have the time in 0.9 Release to fix the implementation, that's definitely something that needs to be fixed in future releases.  Let me go ahead and resurrect the deleted code for now.

author.name: tokunbo
author.emailAddress: tokunbo at cse dot yorku dot ca

comments.body:
How soon do you think full support for FPM will be re-introduced to mahout releases? Are we likely to see this in mahout 10.0 or are can we expect it in much later releases?

Thank you

updateAuthor.name: tokunbo
updateAuthor.emailAddress: tokunbo at cse dot yorku dot ca
